metadata.synopsis: Players saw the ship docked in the Smugglers Cave, and recall that the ship was seen in Moonrise Towers too.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1) Go to Smugglers Cave (or BGO_KidnapperCave bookmark)2) Approach the ship, 3) PAD will trigger.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: That same ship was at Moonrise Towers, if I'm not mistaken.
